comment._content: Na 15 jaar? Na 10 jaar zou ik zeggen! Prachtige sfeerfoto!

comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
The San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives on the Flickr Commons have also posted photos of the very same Lufthansa aircraft  (a Convair 340, registered D-ACOH) being prepared by Convair for delivery.

Here are two:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/4587887773/in/photostream/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/4588509798/in/photostream]
